sentences.en: A surprising number of ailments are caused by unsuspected environmental factors.
sentences.cn: 有大量疾病是由不明环境因素造成的。

sentences.en: Articles in the paper's Medical Section often alert readers [ to ] unsuspected ailments.
sentences.cn: 该报医药栏里的文章常告诫读者对自己浑然不觉的疾病保持警惕.

sentences.en: Combinations of the above, and many other unsuspected and sudden man - made catastrophes.
sentences.cn: 除了上述情况, 还应该包括一些未知的和突发的人为灾祸.

sentences.en: He died in 1984 of an unsuspected brain tumour.
He was able to get into the building unspotted and unsuspected.
sentences.cn: 他能清白、不受怀疑地走入大楼.

sentences.en: I'm expecting to be surprised, because it will be found in a pleasantly unsuspected way.
sentences.cn: 我期待着能有个惊喜, 因为人们将会以一种令人愉快的意外方式发现轴子.

sentences.en: If he could reach a table in the restaurant unsuspected success would be his.
sentences.cn: 只要他到餐桌之前不被人猜疑,成功就属于他了.

sentences.en: If they do not, previously unsuspected faulting could account for the misclosure.
sentences.cn: 如果他们不这样, 尚未发现的断层可能就是造成不闭合的原因.

sentences.en: Most crises, notably the big ones , creep up on us from unsuspected quarters.
sentences.cn: 大多数危机 —— 尤其是那些规模较大的危机 —— 都是从未知角落蹑手蹑脚地向我们逼近.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the surgical treatment of preoperative unsuspected gallbladder carcinoma ( UGC ) and its prognosis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨意外胆囊恶性肿瘤 ( UGC ) 的外科治疗和预后.

sentences.en: Section often alert readers to unsuspected ailments.
sentences.cn: 《时代》周刊医药栏目里的文章常告诫读者对自己意想不到的疾病保持警惕.

sentences.en: She was miserable in considering how much unsuspected vexation was probable ready to burst on him.
sentences.cn: 她很难受,心想,他还不知道有多少让他发火的事情在等着他.

sentences.en: They also had an unsuspected and as yet unexplained, effect of accelerating the animals'growth.
sentences.cn: 它们在加快动物的生长方面也有毋庸置疑但却无法解释的作用.

trans.tran_en: If you describe something as unsuspected, you mean that people do not realize it or are not aware of it
